i have a marketing job.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks! What do you do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, reading, and taking walks. What about you?
I enjoy reading, skiing, and spending time with my family too. I also sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs.  What do you do for work?
I work as a marketing manager for a small business.
Oh cool! I have a job teaching 5th grade students near Oakville, NY.
That sounds like a fun job! I bet you get to have a lot of creative freedom.
Yeah, it's definitely a lot of fun!
I love to read and ski.
I used to ski when I was younger. It was a lot of fun!
It's still a lot of fun!
I know, I've been thinking about getting back into it.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and have fun at the same time.
I know, you're right. I'll have to look into getting some lessons.
That's a great idea! You'll have a lot more fun if you have someone to teach you.
Thanks for the advice! I really appreciate it
